remarks: Commutation with orthocomplement.  Theorem 2.3(i) of [Beran] p. 39. ( ~ cmcm2i analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cmt2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cmt2.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
cmt2.c $e |- C = ( cm ` K ) $.
cmt2N $p |- ( ( K e. OML /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X C Y <-> X C ( ._|_ ` Y ) ) ) $.
